title: Dynamic Mode Decomposition for Neural Recordings
description: Research project focused on applying Dynamic Mode Decomposition to extract meaningful spatio-temporal patterns from large-scale neural recordings for imagination and movement tasks.

details.challenge: Extracting meaningful patterns from high-dimensional neural recording data
details.solution: Implemented Dynamic Mode Decomposition to construct reduced-order representations
outcomes: Successfully reduced high-dimensional neural data to low-dimensional representations
Identified key spatio-temporal patterns in neural recordings
Applied technique to both imagination and movement tasks
